blogPostInfos.title: How can something be faster than 100%?
blogPostInfos.seoTitle: Percentages are somewhat tricky to understand, espcially when people use them in everday language such as, "50% Off" or "Twice as Fast!" "100% Off". This blog post aims to shed light onto the masses on how to interpret the wording "X% faster".
blogPostInfos.abstract: If something is "faster" that means its unit of something over some unit of time has increased
